title: Music Colours

hero.title: Music Colours
hero.subtitle: Catch the colour in the middle of the beat

description.title: Description
description.lead: A rhythm game where the screen changes colours to the beat and you must catch the current colour. Bonuses help you clear levels, and after 10 correct catches you advance to the next level. Watch out for the Death Gift and the time limit!

how.title: How to play
how.caption: Match the colour to the beat
how.intro: Follow the BPM and hit the colour shown in the middle:
items: The screen pulses to the music — watch the colour in the center.
Tap the matching colour at the perfect moment to score a catch.
Keep your streak to advance to the next level.

bonuses.title: Bonuses & levels
bonuses.caption: Boosts and progression
bonuses.intro: Bonuses help you clear stages faster:
items: After 10 correct catches you advance to the next level.
Collect bonuses to extend time or increase your combo.
Avoid the Death Gift — it ends the run instantly.

subscription.title: Custom soundtracks
subscription.caption: Play to your music
subscription.intro: With a subscription you can add your own tracks:
items: Upload or select your own songs and generate beats.
Play with BPM that matches your favorite music.
Unlock additional sound packs and themes.

keywords: Keywords: rhythm game, music, colours, beat, reflexes, bonuses, BPM, arcade
